评论概述: Great Color and Softness, but Very Thick
评论详情: The AUTOMET Women's Oversized Hoodies Fleece Sweatshirts Hooded Pullover has some great features, but also a few drawbacks.  Pros: Amazing Color: The bubblegum pink color is vibrant and looks fantastic. Super Soft Inside: The interior is incredibly soft, making it very comfortable to wear.  Cons: Very Thick and Stiff: The material is so thick that it almost feels stiff. It's so substantial that I feel like it could stand up on its own if I shook it.  While I love the color and the softness, the thickness and stiffness of the hoodie might not be ideal for everyone. If you prefer a softer, more flexible hoodie, this might not be the best choice.  However, if you're looking for something super warm and durable, it could be perfect for you.
I got so many complements wearing this hoodie. For reference I got a size medium and it fits oversized a bit but once washed two times it fits to the perfect size 130 pounds 5'5

I do think the price is a little steep but i am very happy with this, i am usually a small so i got the medium because for some reason that was the size on sale at the time i bought this., but i will be getting a large next time since this does shrink like a tiny tiny bit and i prefer an even more oversized feel. the med is oversized but i want "my boyfriends hoodie feel" i will be getting another brand only because i want the same hoodie but with a front pocket. i would def buy this brand again though. this hoodie is thick and warm.
